name: Deep Sector
description:
Deep Sector 7 facilities show signs of disrepair. Get in your maintenance submarine, fix the faulty electrical panels and get back to the docking bay.

Our deep sea scanners showed some signs of lifeforms swimming around the sector, undoubtedly some small inoffensive fishes. Try not to get lost in the depths. Follow the lights.

Headphones are heavily recommended for maximum immersion.

Controls:

  • Mouse to steer
  • W,A,S,D, Space and Ctrl to move
  • Shift to boost
  • Left click to shoot a stun torpedo
  • Right click to display progress

Credits:

  • Physon712: Game design, Programming, Graphics
  • Nerdspartan: Game design, Programming, Writing
  • DeadllySin: Sound design
